commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew: /** * Bulk set: set at least one and at most len longs starting * at off in arr into this mutable, starting at * index. Returns the actual number of values that have been * set. */ int set(int index, long[] arr, int off, int len);

commits.author: Adrien Grand
commits.sourceOld: /** * Bulk set: set at least one and at most len longs starting * at off in arr into this mutable, starting at * index. Returns the actual number of values that have been * set. */ int set(int index, long[] arr, int off, int len);
